languages.text: The psyker gains the Inscribed Soul {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. It costs no {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} but deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the psyker equal to 25% of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The next {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used after this ability will not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} and will not degrade the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g}.
languages.original_text: Псайкер получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Исчерченная душа. Она не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. При ее применении псайкер получает {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g}, равный 25% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}. Следующая {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосила{/g} не спровоцирует появление {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-морока{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угроз варпа{/g} и не будет способствовать истончению {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}завесы{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The psyker gains an Inscribed Soul ability. It costs no AP, but deals direct damage to the psyker equal to 25% of the psyker's maximum wounds. The next psychic power used after this ability will not trigger psychic phenomena or perils of the warp and will not damage the veil.

The psyker gains the Inscribed Soul ability. It costs no AP but deals direct damage to the psyker equal to 25% of the psyker's maximum wounds. The next psychic power used after this ability will not trigger psychic phenomena or perils of the warp and will not damage the veil.

The psyker gains the Inscribed Soul {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. It costs no {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} but deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the psyker equal to 25% of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The next {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used after this ability will not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} and will not degrade the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g}.

languages.text: El psíquico gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Alma inscrita . No cuesta {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, pero inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} al psíquico igual al 25 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}. El siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} que use no desencadenará {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómenos psíquicos{/g} ni {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g} y tampoco dañará el {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}velo{/g}.
languages.original_text: The psyker gains the Inscribed Soul {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. It costs no {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} but deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the psyker equal to 25% of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The next {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used after this ability will not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} and will not degrade the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El psíquico gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Alma inscrita . No cuesta {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, pero inflige daño directo al psíquico igual al 25 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas. El siguiente poder psíquico que use no desencadenará {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómenos psíquicos{/g} ni {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g} y tampoco dañará el velo.

languages.text: 灵能者获得灵魂刻印{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。此能力不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，但会对灵能者造成{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的25%。 此能力发动后，下个{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}灵能异象{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}，也不会对{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁{/g}造成任何损害。
languages.original_text: The psyker gains the Inscribed Soul {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. It costs no {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} but deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the psyker equal to 25% of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The next {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used after this ability will not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} and will not degrade the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 灵能者获得灵魂刻印{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。此能力不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，但会对灵能者造成直击伤害，等同于最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的25%。 此能力发动后，下个灵能能力不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}灵能异象{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}，也不会对障壁造成任何损害。

languages.text: Der Psioniker erlangt die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Beschriebene Seele. Sie kostet keine {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, fügt dem Psioniker aber {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} von 25 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} zu. Die nächste {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g}, die nach dieser Fähigkeit eingesetzt wird, löst kein {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionisches Phänomen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} aus. Den {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Schleier{/g} beschädigt sie auch nicht.
languages.original_text: The psyker gains the Inscribed Soul {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. It costs no {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} but deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the psyker equal to 25% of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The next {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used after this ability will not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} and will not degrade the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Psioniker erlangt die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Beschriebene Seele. Sie kostet keine {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, fügt dem Psioniker aber Direktschaden von 25 % seiner maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zu. Die nächste psionische Kraft, die nach dieser Fähigkeit eingesetzt wird, löst kein {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionisches Phänomen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} aus. Den Schleier beschädigt sie auch nicht.

languages.text: Le psyker acquiert la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Âme dédiée. Celle-ci ne lui coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, mais elle lui inflige un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} égal à 25 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}. Le {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} suivant qui est utilisé après cette capacité ne déclenche pas de {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}phénomènes psychiques{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g} et ne dégrade pas le {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}voile{/g}.
languages.original_text: The psyker gains the Inscribed Soul {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. It costs no {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} but deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the psyker equal to 25% of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The next {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used after this ability will not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} and will not degrade the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g}.

Celle-ci ne lui coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, mais elle lui inflige un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} égal à 25 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}. Le {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} suivant qui est utilisé après cette capacité ne déclenche pas de {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}phénomènes psychiques{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g} et ne dégrade pas le {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}voile{/g}.

languages.text: 異能者は彫り込まれし魂の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を得る。消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}はゼロだが、異能者にその{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力の25%に等しい{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を与える。 このアビリティ使用後、次に使用される{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}を引き起こさず、{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェール{/g}を劣化させない。
languages.original_text: The psyker gains the Inscribed Soul {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. It costs no {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} but deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the psyker equal to 25% of the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The next {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used after this ability will not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} and will not degrade the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 異能者は彫り込まれし魂の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を得る。消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}はゼロだが、異能者にその最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の25%に等しい直接ダメージを与える。 このアビリティ使用後、次に使用される超能力は{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}を引き起こさず、ヴェールにダメージを与えない。
